data.text: @PamelaBermudez0 Hello, please send us a DM with more details about your request. Regards.
@jjmcenhill You can check our available flights through the previous link that we sent. Regards.
@jjmcenhill Hi, you can book your flights here: https://t.co/6rTlpuKcFr. Do not forget to read the terms and conditions. Regards.
@summertinkles Alexa, não há mais a obrigatoriedade de manter o assento do meio desocupado. Por isso, só haverá o bloqueio quando houver disponibilidade no voo. Permanecemos à disposição.
@fredcfreitas1 We can not provide you and exact date due to the fact that we have a high demand on these type of requests. Please, wait for our contact. Regards.
@Jo_Xplore Hi, please send us via DM your Travel Voucher number and your full name in order to verify the information. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Hi, for questions regarding this issue, enter to the website indicated. Your bank transfer is in process and  we will notify you once the process has concluded. Regards.

@KarinTaps We know that our greatest commitment is to deliver the resolution that you have waited for, moment we are working in favor of that commitment. Once we have the corresponding resolution, we will let you know through your email. Regards.
@Livestron4life Hi, send us a DM with your travel voucher number to look into it. Thanks.
@StefanieParty Hi, each claim is independent of each other. Regards.
If you believe money is owed to you by LATAM, you have until December 18th, 2020 to file a claim in the chapter 11 bankruptcy. https://t.co/AOAEPE747s https://t.co/qBE23bgeKd

@summertinkles [+] Adicionalmente, um procedimento intenso de limpeza está sendo cumprido e todas as superfícies de contato são desinfectadas com álcool 70% e outros materiais indicados pela Anvisa e pelos órgãos internacionais.

@summertinkles [+] Importante destacar ainda que é obrigatório o uso de máscaras a bordo e que as nossas aeronaves possuem um sistema de recirculação de ar que renova o ar no avião a cada 3 minutos graças aos filtros HEPA (High Efficiency Particulate Air), que removem 99,97% das partículas. [+]

@summertinkles [+] De toda forma, asseguramos que seguimos todas as orientações e medidas recomendadas pelas autoridades de saúde dos países onde operamos, além da Organização Mundial de Saúde e da Associação Internacional do Transporte Aéreo (Iata). [+]
@summertinkles Olá Alexa, bom dia. O bloqueio do assento do meio como medida de distanciamento social não é uma recomendação pela IATA entre as suas diretrizes para garantir um voo seguro. [+]
@GeiseZa Hello, we can see the transfer was requested, but it's still in process. Remember that this can take longer than usual due to the high amount of requests at the moment.
@kleinekappel We replied to your DM. Regards.
@kleinekappel Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.
@KarinTaps Hi, as soon as we have an update about your cases, we'll let you know. Regards.
@argentinasil Sugerimos que puedas eliminar tu respuesta, ya que contiene información personal sobre tu reserva, por favor envíanos la información correspondiente por DM. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@RodNYC1 We added your comments to the claim, and as soon as we have an update on it, you will be notified via email. Regards.
@RodNYC1 Hello, we are still working on your case at this moment, and we will contact you via email as soon as possible. Regards.
@KarinTaps Hi, we're working to give you an answer as soon as possible. Stay tuned. Regards.
@argentinasil Hola, por favor envíanos por DM mayor detalle del descuento al que haces referencia. Estaremos atentos.
@nicogatu Hola Nico, para poder ayudarte por favor indicanos por DM el detalle de tu requerimiento. Estaremos atentos a tus comentarios.
@vivi_868 Hello, send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM. Regards.

@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Hi, the bank transfer of your two travel vouchers are still in process. All refunds are taking longer than expected. Rest assured that you will receive your money. Once it has been concluded, we will let you now through your email. Regards.
@gabrielelizondo Hello, send us your booking code and the names of the passengers via DM, in order to provide more information. Regards.
@TITANC_C Hola, envíanos por DM más detalles de lo ocurrido, el código de reserva y el nombre de los pasajeros. Quedamos atentos.
@EBWelter Hi, if the ticket was issued by a travel agency, you'll have to get in contact with them for assistance. Regards.
@KonejoBB Hi, we are working and operating our flights. In case you have a question, let us know. Regards.

From today on, we’ll fly to Peru again! Go back to touring America leaving from Lima, counting on the safety and flexibility of our #NewWaysToFly. Learn about the operational destinations here https://t.co/bVu4y3FziV https://t.co/dncTTmlb3T

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: The #PinkOctober month is coming to an end, but active awareness in the fight against breast cancer must continue. We share relevant data for you to bear in mind the importance of self-examination and annual check-up for early detection. #DoTheSelfExam https://t.co/SlCvFI5QJ6

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: @ArreolaSport Hola, envíanos tu código de reserva y/o número de ticket para más detalle vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@RodNYC1 Hi, we continue working on your case and will get back to you as soon as possible with an update. Thanks for your comprehension.
@geovanequeiroz Hi, we'll be aware of further inquiries or requirements. Regards.
@Mkbonani Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@Lambomoon_ Hi, please send us a DM with more details of your request. Regards.
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 The process is taking that long because if the number of current requests.
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 The refund of your travel vouchers is in process. It's taking more than usual due to the high number of requests. When you get the money refunded, we'll notify you. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Hi, your bank transfer is in process. We will notify you once the process has concluded. Regards.
@migrantemilenia Carolina, no se negará el embarque. Saludos
Watch our latest chapter of “60 seconds”, where Andreas Schek answers your questions about purchase conditions and flexibility. https://t.co/tC6h1rV9GV

@migrantemilenia Con base en la información antes envida, la debes presentar de lo contrario deberás realizar 14 días de cuarentena obligatoria. Te invitamos a consultar la información ingresando por medio del enlace previamente enviado. Saludos.

@migrantemilenia Hola, estarán exentos de la cuarentena obligatoria los pasajeros que presenten test RT-PCR negativo, realizado en el extranjero máximo 72 horas previo al ingreso a Chile. Para mayor información consultar aquí: https://t.co/DQ6hKv5qNT. Saludos.

urls.title: Requisitos para viajar | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Chile.

data.text: @MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Hi, we've replied through your Facebook account, please check. Regards.

data.text: @misandrialegria Hi, yes, you can use boxes containing a system for opening and sealing instead of bags. They have to comply with the conditions shown in our website. We cannot be held responsible for damage of your belongings while transporting your baggage. Regards.
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Your bank transfer is in process. We will notify you once the process has concluded. We recommend you to hide your comment because it contains personal information. Regards.
@MARCIOSAMPAIO99 Hi, please send us the booking code or ticket number by DM. We'll be aware of it. Regards.
@NOEXCUSEENT Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@Gabriel64520172 Hi, please send us a DM with your booking code. Regards.
@agustingamio We replied to your DM. Regards.
@RodNYC1 Hi, as soon as we have an update about your case, we'll let you know. Regards.
@agustingamio Hi, send us your booking code or ticket number through a DM to verify your protecting options. Regards.
@Hollygheee Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@argentinasil Debido a que realizaste la compra mediante una agencia de viajes, deberás contactarte con ellos. Saludos.
@argentinasil En este caso sugerimos contactarte directamente con tu agencia de viajes.
@argentinasil Verificamos que lo adquiriste a través de una agencia de viajes, asimismo sugerimos contactarte directamente con ellos para mayor detalle e información.
@argentinasil Hola, por favor indícanos en qué idioma deseas que te asistamos mediante DM, quedamos atentos.
@Hollygheee Hi, in order to help you please send us the ticket number or travel voucher associated with the pending refund via DM. We'll be waiting for it. Regards.
@mamma0113 We sent you a DM. Regards.

Did you know that the air system inside an airplane generates an effect comparable to maintaining a distance of 2 meters between people? Learn more in this study conducted by Boeing: https://t.co/gG4V9wYQUW #NewWaysToFly https://t.co/OTiTXXruQu

data.text: @mamma0113 Hi, we sent you a DM. Thanks.
@carlosciurlizza Hi, please have the certainty that we are working on your case. As soon as we have an update, we will contact you through your email. Regards.
@hunterthom_ We recommend that you check this information in advance with the Consulate or Embassy of the country you are traveling to. Regards.
@hunterthom_ Hi, our flights are subject to change and subject to every government restrictions. You can check them here: https://t.co/mTbC7RhMfB. Regards.
@BarrettDiaz2 Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. Please check the following information: https://t.co/xQNCbWQ5V5. Regards.

Detecting breast cancer early can make all the difference. We invite you to watch this video and share it with all the people you know to find out how to do the self-exam. #PinkOctober #DoTheSelfExam https://t.co/TsUenB13k5

domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: @Daniel00866308 Hola Daniel, para poder ayudarte correctamente, por favor envíanos por DM tu código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos) más el nombre completo de pasajero. Quedamos atentos a los datos, saludos.

@Joemaguina10 Hi, we do not have the same fares as a travel agency. If you need assistance, send us through DM the ticket number, booking code and the full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@ricticuluscco Hello, please send us your reservation code, ticket number and name of the passenger. Thank you.
@Rafadelos Hola, aún seguimos trabajando para ti, una vez que tengamos respuesta o mayores detalles nos estaremos contactando contigo a través de tu correo electrónico.
@DebGrange Hi, we can assist you through here, just send us your query and booking code through a DM. Regards.
@realREdmondson Hi Roy, send us a DM with your booking code to assist you. Thanks.
@KarinTaps Hi, please send us a DM with your ticket number and case number. Regards.
@hunterthom_ Hello, please send us your booking code via DM. Regards.
@sol_quin Hola Marisol, te hemos enviado un mensaje por medio de DM. Saludos.

@carlosciurlizza Hi, let us check the information, in order to do so, please provide via DM, the travel voucher number. You can also provide the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits). Our sincere condolences for your loss. We'll be awaiting your response.

@estemanmesuena Hola, para poder verificar la información, por favor nos indicas vía DM, el código (6 letras) o el número de ticket (13 dígitos) y nos confirmas nombre/apellido del pasajero. Recuerda que es responsabilidad del pasajero informarse sobre los requisitos a viajar. Quedamos atentos.
@RodNYC1 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@MHKrlos Hola Carlos, te hemos escrito por vía mensaje privado. Saludos.
@rafaell__ Hi, please send us a DM with more details of your request. Regards.
@OfficialZazaK We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@carolin49442519 Hi, to verify the status of your refund request, send us your ticket number or Travel Voucher number through a DM. Regards.
@OfficialZazaK We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@RoyRobertson123 We can see the refund has been requested, but due to the high demand, the transfer can take more time than usual. Regards.
@grillojoao Hi, send us through DM the Travel Voucher number and the full name of the holder in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@colormiche Hola, por favor envianos un DM con tu código de reserva, numero de ticket, nombre del pasajero y numero de travel voucher. Gracias.
@coupongaldeals Hi, in order to provide you further assistance, please send us your booking code or ticket number and your full name via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@lgsanche Hi, send us through DM the ticket number, booking code and the full name of the passenger in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@RodNYC1 Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@CultivatedExpe1 Hi, we don't process refunds of tickets that have been issued through a third party. All this process is done by your agency, and their support desk. All agencies have their own support channels, and through them, they will be able to assist you with the refund. Regards.
@ambforevah Hi, we have sent a message through DM. Regards.
@OfficialZazaK We sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@TinkerRaquel Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@jtovar2320 Hi, let us check the information, in order to do so, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@OfficialZazaK We provided you a formal response through the case number 27818995. We suggest you to contact your travel agency in order to request the corresponding change. Regards.
@ceebuttas We recommend deleting your tweet since it contains personal information. You  must contact your travel agency to follow up the process. Thanks.

@OfficialZazaK Zaza, we are referring to the original purchase. That is the information we can not see to proceed with your change. This is why your travel agency must contact their help desk for further assistance.
@OfficialZazaK Yes, but we can not proceed with your change since we can not see the information from the original ticket. Sorry.
